channel.name: TVNZ 2 NZ
channel.title: Kitchen Nightmares
channel.desc: Season Finale: Gordon heads to NY to help an Indian restaurant that's been operating for 35-years. A decline in trade led to fusion experiments - with mixed results.

channel.name: TVNZ 2 NZ
channel.title: Gordon, Gino & Fred: Viva Espana
channel.desc: Gordon, Gino & Fred are in Spain, immersed in the best culture and cuisine on offer. Finding gastronomical gems in both sunny southern Andalusia and north-west Celtic Galicia.

channel.name: TVNZ 2 NZ
channel.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
channel.desc: A man accused of murdering his wife and co-workers leads the CSIs on a wild chase through a busy Vegas casino.
